title: uchegod-21
author: uchegod-21
content: Make I no for paint words here. Make I go straight to the point. CryptopreneurBrainboss, you fit request for child boards for us, among the children board will be Off topic child board.If you check the first page, you go discover say 70% of the topics wey dey there na off topics. I mean if you make am for the large forum, moderators go move am to off topic.If na off topic for large forum, na still  off topic for here.E get when this matter been raise but we been no know the importance of it. Now we don get our board I think we need Off topic and Politics and Society. These two children board dey important because due to how our government dey treat us, an average Nigerian love to talk about politics and government.

The board is always choked up with similar topics and discussions, if they can be separated into different sub-boards, we can get to discuss more intensively on the topic that matters most at that time rather than seeing similar discussions filled up in the first page.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: The need for us to get not just those two but other child's board as well na old matter way we don yan before plenty but somehow, we no been ho too further and it was dropped. Still, I view a say na necessityof we go want make this we corner get some organisation to it. As e be now, na either we determine relevance or not because,the threads deu come at an unanticipated rate, existing and non exiting.A grouping go really help us keep things down and abuse to a minimum.Any which way, till we get or decide how we want am to be, we go still dey put body through advice and reports on wayin we feel say no dey okay. Like that, people go dey learn from mistakes.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Nah beta suggestion be dis because while the new ones wan try participate by creating threads, some of them dey miss the point or the reason this naija board bin dey formed. Creating these sub boards if possible go help put some discussion for where them belong because although not all of them be off topic or shit post, them also no dey crypto related, so such a thing go help put them in their right places just as e dey for the other sides.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: I also notice how off topics are flooding our local boards, and all this threads were created by some newbies, and the topics no they related to the main function of this forum and the local board as well.Some of us think say this local board na for just our political and other Nigeria related discussions, not knowing that the board is main for given Bitcoin related contributions withing our local community in case if person de wey no they understand better English de with us.Quote from: uchegod-21 on May 18, 2023, 10:04:50 PMMake I no for paint words here. Make I go straight to the point. CryptopreneurBrainboss, you fit request for child boards for us, among the children board will be Off topic child board.Na good idea oo, but e no de always de easy to get your request granted from up as you can see how long we bee pursue the local board before we get am. So for now, na to keep de give our people more orientation and guidance so that them go reduce the rate of spamming in the local board.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: uchegod-21 on May 18, 2023, 10:04:50 PMSnip~ My friend the issue you raised is very important,  because now na the right time to have a subboard this is most needed now that we have our own local board,  but one very important point we need to get clarity on is the issue of political discussion which is no doubt that our present political condition as a nation warrant such discussion at thos point. Let's see how we can connect the nods with linking politics vs cryptocurrency in 9ja, we may further discuss government perception on Bitcoin /cryptocrunrry in Nigeria and the inflation rate within the economy, such Discussions can not be made on the general board since it may look political even though it covers some grey areas in bitcoin and cryptocurrency adoptions

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: DaNNy001 on May 21, 2023, 09:24:12 PMWell no doubt say every body go glady support this notion because the matter don tire everyone and if we only complain amongst our self here e be like say the thing no go work, I no support the motion and no be say the talk no make sense but at this point it's not needed. How many months is our board? When last you think say theymos grant local board for people and now now you wan go dey request for subboard? The board wey dem give us we never enjoy am we wan go dey create topic say make dem give us more things when others own never dey granted self (na this kind things dey cause envy). Abi una never noticed say Nigerian has been the target and in the radar of recent for defaulters in the forum (from plagiarism to alts wey dey promote rubbish campaigns dem), make things cool down first. How many Bitcoin related topic wey una dun start before una begin the complain say people dey talk rubbish, why una dey engage in the rubbish in the first place, if una ignore the topic e go go down sharp sharp and when the OP see say people no dey interested him no go create similar topics in the future. We need to develop the habit of creating Bitcoin contents if we want to ask for other subboard to be created. Wetin be the argument wey we wan go gi present give theymos now say we need subboard for this boards wey you no fit count reach three active Bitcoin discussion for the main board?.

comments.body: Na small small we dey carry dey lick soup wey dey hot, I know say we don try achieve somethings for the forum but make e no be like say we too dey rush for everything. I never sure say we don get like 100 pages for this we local board self, like this if we don get plenty pages e go enable us to take hold hand dey drag for another thing for we board.This na wetin I think oo, if this one no follow abeg me una no vex

Wetin be the argument wey we wan go gi present give theymos now say we need subboard for this boards wey you no fit count reach three active Bitcoin discussion for the main board?. Snr. Man, you make good point here wey good to reckon with. You see this issue of attack on Nigerians, I am a witness infact I have had the experience too. It is very dissappointing though but we need to be careful because our board now is a big target and we know that based on the happenings here. I would advise that we take it gradually and step by step to achieving all we want. We should be happy we got our request granted to us when others are yet to receive theirs. The next thing I expected of us is to take time to building our local board so that we could have something tangible and meaningful when making any further request.As you have said with respect to posts here, since we don't have our own moderator,  it would be difficult to delete some post but the only option left for us now is ignoring that topic created so that the the person who created that topic would be reasonable enough to count his teeth with his tongue.I would encourage us to engage our local board frequently so as to keep it more active but not just that, let it be more coordinated and organized so that if any of the global moderators visits to examine how far we have gone, they would have no option than to commend us and give us our child board without much stress on their own.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.created_time: May 24, 2023, 03:46:32 PMLast edit: May 25, 2023, 08:33:51 PM by CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: uchegod-21 on May 23, 2023, 07:08:47 PMSnr man CryptopreneurBrainboss, I no support you for this  one. If we ask for childboard, no be favour we dey ask for,  e no get anything to do with eyes dey naija. Asking for childboard no be asking for local board.The message format dey simple.Sub board matter no be PM matter, subboard only gets approved when other topics are dominating the board wey you wan separate the subboard topics from. To get subboard you need request am as you request your local board nobi for PM. E get reason why Nigeria was granted local board ahead of other people wey request first and wey even dey active pass us. Na our coordinations, na be rushing something and besides there are other important things we have at hand wey important pass subboard. First we need to reduces the spam on the board and no be to push them go one side because if we do like that we just spoil the whole local board as Nigerian will be known to be a local board of spammers and low quality users.That one no be the kind identify we want get for ourselves. Make the post dey happen here for now where we fit dey correct people because immediately we divide the board, some people no go even visit those other subboard and dem go just turn to those altcoins boards wey spam full am like water. For the moment make we they correct the defaulters as dem dey come and make we join hand create more Bitcoin discussions on the main board. When we get more Bitcoin discussion and people see how the contributions dey go dem go join too to dey create Bitcoin discussion. Other discussion can be in sub-threads just as we did the gubernatorial election thread.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Off-topic child board no go solve the issue of spam for this local board, child board fit even make am worse because some of our Nigerian users fit leave main board go base for off-topic child board they post as they like, you know say many people they erroneously see off-topic boards as a place for spam. E get some threads wey i dey see for our board wey dey too unnecessary, and e make me conclude say some people no sabi use online forum, because e get some matter wey person no suppose carry enter here. Make we leave am as e dey now, na local moderator for sure pass, if spam posts are deleted quickly, e sure me say people go stop to they make spam posts.
